alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 09 at 6:40AM AKST until February 10 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: Snow has developed across the Panhandle. Snow began during the overnight hours and will last through Thursday. The snow may begin to mix with rain Thursday afternoon. An area of enhanced precipitation looks to develop over the northern areas later tonight. The placement of this enhancement could affect amounts along with temperatures being near or just above freezing. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Icy Strait corridor and the City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Wet heavy snow will be difficult to move. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected Thursday morning and then again Thursday night. Some mixing with rain is possible at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay
